ing: 1 (.7 ounce) package dry Italian-style salad dressing mix
des: "Cucumber sandwiches!!    Top party rye with cream cheese and a slice of cucumber, and let the little appetizers work their magic!"
ins: In a small bowl, mix whipped cream cheese and dry Italian-style dressing mix. Spread equal portions of the mixture on slices of the cocktail rye bread. Top each with a slice of cucumber.
